participant_1.background:
I like to dye my hair bright colors because it's a way to express myself and my love of nature.
I once met a celebrity while I was walking my dogs.
My weekdays are spent in a stuffy office, but on the weekends I put on my uniform and fight for the Union.
I enjoy watching the rain from the window and cuddling with my cats.
i speak french and english fluently.

participant_2.background:
I am prone to spending hours researching random topics online.
music has always been my number one passion.
I would buy a mobile for my baby's nursery.
we are getting married in a park.
I would love to learn how to make my own clothes.

content.text: I'm doing great! I'm so excited to get married in a park.
That sounds lovely! I'm sure it will be a beautiful ceremony.
Thank you! I'm also looking forward to starting a family. I would love to have a mobile in my baby's nursery.
That's a great idea! I love music, and I think it would be really soothing for a baby.
Yeah, I think so too. I also love learning new things, so I would love to learn how to make my own clothes.
That's awesome! I'm sure you would be great at it.
Thanks! I'm excited to try it.
